name: Kickstart UI Kit
description:
Hi, FigFriends

With this minimal UI kit, I want to help everyone who is in the process of building their own Design System or as a starting point for any new project. Take this lightweight kit right away without customizing and digging in large, complex UI kits. I hope it helps if you have any questions please feel free to write me.


Content

  • Colors, Typography and Effects
  • Buttons, Inputs and controls
  • Tabs, Tags, Badges and App response
  • Web and Mobile Navigation


Version

V1.0 - Basic elements

V1.1 - Added web avatar (36px)

V1.2 - Added alternativ colors (warm and cold), expanded accessibility tests

V1.3 - Added base components for buttons


Contact

I'm always happy to chat, let's connect Twitter
